title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; stream chats or embeddings from local Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat history, model management, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compat endpoints.

title: ollama-cli (sugarforever/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive REPL and productivity CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation persistence and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot (cmiller01/ollama-copilot)
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like plugin for VS Code that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, fluent builder, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rag (glangchain/ollama-rag)
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings, Chroma vector store, and LangChain.

title: ollama-nomic-embeddings (jamesbraza/ollama-nomic)
summary: Nomic-embed-text packaged for Ollama with benchmarking scripts and cosine-similarity evaluation.

title: ollama-gui (ollama-gui/ollama-gui)
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-django (nsteinmetz/ollama-django)
summary: Django app + REST API that exposes Ollama models to web clients with token-based auth and admin analytics.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports streaming chat, embeddings, and list models with async/await.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter (paulrobinson/ollama-spring)
summary: Spring Boot starter that autoconfigures an Ollama client bean and adds YAML-based model configuration.

title: ollama-rust (mdrokz/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers over Ollama REST API with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-docker-compose (rumblefrog/ollama-docker)
summary: Collection of docker-compose stacks combining Ollama with Open-WebUI, Postgres, and GPU runtime flags.

title: ollama-reddit discussion
summary: Community thread discussing new model drops, performance tips, and ARM64 Mac builds.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News conversation on Ollama v0.1.37 release highlighting GPU memory usage fixes and new Modelfile commands.

title: ollama-pypi stats
summary: Official ollama Python package page showing 300k+ monthly downloads and changelog up to v0.1.9.
